headline: Automated Logic Completes Acquisition of Control Solutions, Ltd. Establishing First Field Office in British Columbia
summary: Automated Logic – Canada, Ltd. (ALC), a leading provider of innovative building-management solutions and a part of Carrier Global Corporation (NYSE: CARR), global leader in intelligent climate and energy solutions, today announced that it has acquired Control Solutions, Ltd. (CSL), an independent provider of integrated building-automation systems headquartered in Coquitlam, British Columbia. summary: We recently published 13 Stocks That Jim Cramer Recently Talked About. Carrier Global Corporation (NYSE:CARR) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed.
